description: Takes a set of configuration settings and either a configuration template or environment, and determines whether those values are valid. This action returns a list of messages indicating any errors or warnings associated with the selection of option values.

parameters.name: ApplicationName
parameters.description: The name of the application that the configuration template or environment belongs to.

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: The name of the configuration template to validate the settings against. Condition: You cannot specify both this and an environment name.

parameters.name: EnvironmentName
parameters.description: The name of the environment to validate the settings against. Condition: You cannot specify both this and a configuration template name.

parameters.name: OptionSettings
parameters.description: A list of the options and desired values to evaluate. (dict) --- A specification identifying an individual configuration option along with its current value. For a list of possible namespaces and option values, see Option Values in the AWS Elastic Beanstalk Developer Guide. ResourceName (string) --- A unique resource name for the option setting. Use it for a time---based scaling configuration option. Namespace (string) --- A unique namespace that identifies the option's associated AWS resource. OptionName (string) --- The name of the configuration option. Value (string) --- The current value for the configuration option.

nested_params.name: ResourceName
nested_params.description: A unique resource name for the option setting. Use it for a time---based scaling configuration option.

nested_params.name: Namespace
nested_params.description: A unique namespace that identifies the option's associated AWS resource.

nested_params.name: OptionName
nested_params.description: The name of the configuration option.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The current value for the configuration option.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A message describing the error or warning.

nested_items.name: Severity
nested_items.description: An indication of the severity of this message:
error: This message indicates that this is not a valid setting for an option.
warning: This message is providing information you should take into account.

nested_items.name: Namespace
nested_items.description: The namespace to which the option belongs.
